column4: hey dudes, just installed ubuntu with the Wubi installer (lazy lazy me ^) Now Im trying to find where all the windows files are hiding. Mostly intrested in getting access to my gaming folder... (only one harddrive at the moment so linux/windows with games and all on the same one)... where do I find this? thanks in advance
/host or something if I remember correctly, also much better to use real partitions for any Linux distro
no what celthunder told you to do is for a pshyicall install real partitions, not Windows
celthunder  Also a pshyicall partitioend install, would show the Windows partition anyway, and allow access to it
